tasks.task: Run for club officer election/district officer election. 竞选俱乐部/大区官员。
Become a club officer. 担任俱乐部官员。
Become a district officer. 担任大区官员。
Become a mentor of 3 members and uncover one way to enrich that experience.. 成为三名会员的导师并形成至少一种丰富导师经验的方法。
Become a club sponsor. 成为一家俱乐部的sponsor。
Become a club mentor. 成为一家俱乐部的mentor。
Become a club coach. 成为一家俱乐部的coach。
Complete one HPL project. 完成一个HPL项目。
Complete one path. 完成一条路径。
Plan out your path to achieve DTM (If you have one, do a 2nd！).规划实现DTM的路径（如果你已经有了，那就做第二个！）。
